title: Patchy

properties.name: description
properties.value: Patchy is a pirate who can be found south-west of the bank on Mos Le'Harmless. Patchy can sew certain items together. It costs 500 coins to connect them, and 600 coins to take them apart. When asked why it costs more to take them apart, he will state that it is due to "wear and tear on scissors".

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Patchy

Advanced data
NPC ID1053

Patchy is a pirate who can be found south-west of the bank on Mos Le'Harmless. Patchy can sew certain items together. It costs 500 coins to connect them, and 600 coins to take them apart. When asked why it costs more to take them apart, he will state that it is due to "wear and tear on scissors".

Sewed items[edit | edit source]

Patchy will sew the following items:

Item Components
Bandana eyepatch (blue) Right eye patch
Pirate bandana (blue)
Bandana eyepatch (white) Right eye patch
Pirate bandana (white)
Bandana eyepatch (brown) Right eye patch
Pirate bandana (brown)
Bandana eyepatch (red) Right eye patch
Pirate bandana (red)
Hat eyepatch Right eye patch
Pirate's hat
Crabclaw hook Crab claw
Pirate's hook
Dark flippers[1] Dark claw
Flippers
Cavalier mask Black cavalier
Highwayman mask
Beret mask Mime mask
Black beret
Partyhat & specs Blue partyhat
Sagacious spectacles
Top hat & monocle Top hat
Monocle
Pirate hat & patch Big pirate hat
Right eye patch
Double eye patch Left eye patch
Right eye patch
  1. ^ The dark claw will not be returned if the item is separated.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His name and examine text is most likely a reference to Patchy the Pirate from Spongebob Squarepants.
